Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Requires the developmental disabilities advisory council to submit an annual report on the activities of the council
Summary: Requires the developmental disabilities advisory council to submit an annual report to the governor, temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly on the activities of the council, and to make such report public.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.05, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring the developmental disabilities advisory council to submit an annual report on the activities of the council
